Text:
Almost a week late. EZTV used to be reliable number 1. Last couple of months have been a massive fall from grace with most shows coming out a lot later than all others and backing it up with terrible upload speeds.

Thanks for your effort though, I hope you can get back to providing the amazing quick service you used to offer. When you do I'll go back to supporting and seeding your torrents but for now I'll stick with the uploaders who can keep up.
